tool_description: An API to generate charts easily and quickly
name: 24HourCharts
title: 24HourCharts

api_list.name: /v1/charts/html
api_list.description: Create a Chart and returns HTML
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://24hourcharts.p.rapidapi.com/v1/charts/html"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "24hourcharts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
